title: Virtual Theatre: Beyond the Garden of Adrian
brief: Immersive VR theatre experiment exploring elements of intimacy and embodiment in virtual environments. Lead designer and developer role.

subtitles.title: Project Description
subtitles.content: Beyond the Garden of Adrian is a virtual theatre experience created in Unity adapted from a 1 on 1 immersive theatre performance by Adrian Howells. The experiment aims to explore the potential of building intimate experience in a virtual environment, and explore how each element in the virtual environment uniquely contributes to the immersion and embodiment of each audience.

subtitles.title: My Responsibility
subtitles.content:
Designed and implemented two versions of Beyond the Garden of Adrian for A/B testing
Collaborated closely with the team to design and implement various interactive elements within the virtual environment, ensuring that the technical aspects aligned with the artistic vision of the project.
Assisted in optimizing the performance of the VR experience to provide a smooth and immersive experience for users according to audience feedback.

subtitles.title: Tech Stack
subtitles.content: Unity, C#, Blender, Adobe Photoshop, Oculus VR
